title: AWS Config
description: Monitors and records config changes tracks what changed and when. Evaluates compliance & notifies you of any changes or compliance violations.

title: AWS Budgets
description: Set spending or usage limits for services. Get alerts. Plan and monitor your spending or service usage. See your current usage, forecasted usage.

title: AWS CloudWatch
description: Monitors metrics (CPU, memory, disk usage, latency). collects logs. Alerts you. Automate responses.

title: CloudTrail
description: logs all API activity in your AWS account. records account activity and API. help with auditing, compliance, and security.

title: Cost Explorer
description: tool that shows AWS spending trends, breakdowns by service, and usage insights over time. By instance type, region, account, or tag.

title: ElastiCache
description: in-memory caching service for fast data retrieval. accelerates database performance Quick answers for common requests.

title: S3 Standard
description: High performance, low latency storage for frequently accessed ‘hot’ data. Best for active apps, content distribution, and big data analytic.

title: S3 Intelligent Tiering
description: Moves objects between frequent and infrequent tiers to optimize costs. No retrieval fees, for unpredictable access patterns.

title: S3 Standard-IA
description: Infrequent access Low-cost storage for data accessed less often but needs fast retrieval. Good backups, disaster recovery, and infrequently used data.

title: S3 Glacier Deep Archive
description: Lowest cost for long-term retention and compliance. Best for archival, legal hold, and regulatory data.

title: AWS Inspector
description: scans workloads for vulnerabilities. outdated software, misconfigurations, and risks. security assessment tool.

title: AWS Direct Connect
description: provides a private connection between your on-prem and AWS. Private hallway to the cloud. Better perform, reliability, and lower latency.

title: Basic Support
description: Free tier with access to whitepapers, documentation, forums, and 7 core Trusted Advisor checks. No technical case support, suitable for experimentation and learning.

title: Developer Support
description: Business-hour technical support, general architecture guidance. 24-hour response time for general guidance; dev/test envs.

title: Business Support
description: Full Trusted Advisor checks, and third-party software integration help. ideal for production. respns for production issues;

title: Enterprise On-Ramp Support
description: TAM pool access, cost optimization workshops, and limited proactive architecture reviews. Best for organizations scaling toward enterprise operations.

title: Enterprise Support
description: Highest tier with a dedicated TAM (Technical Account Manager), proactive architecture guidance, operations reviews, and 15-min response for critical issues. Best for mission-critical workloads.

title: IAM Roles
description: Grant temporary permissions to users or services. Used for cross-account access or service-to-service interactions.

title: IAM Groups
description: A container for users. Organize users and apply IAM policies at the group level for consistent permissions.

title: IAM Policies
description: Grant or deny specific permissions to users, groups, or roles. Define what actions and resources are allowed.

title: Service Control Policies (SCPs)
description: Organization-wide guardrails in AWS Organizations. Restrict what actions are possible across accounts, even if IAM policies allow them.

title: Security Groups
description: Stateful firewalls for individual EC2 instances. Automatically allow return traffic for allowed inbound requests.

title: Network ACLs (NACLs)
description: Stateless firewalls for entire subnets. Require explicit rules for inbound and outbound traffic.

title: Read Replicas
description: Improve read performance of a database by creating replicas. Ideal for scaling read-heavy workloads horizontally.

title: AWS Global Accelerator
description: Create accelerators to improve the performance of your applications for local and global users. Optimizes network paths for TCP and UDP traffic low latency and high availability.

title: Amazon Macie
description: A security service that uses machine learning to automatically find and protect sensitive data, such as personally identifiable information (PII) stored in Amazon S3.

title: Amazon Aurora
description: A relational database that is compatible with MySQL and PostgreSQL, but faster and more scalable.Automatically replicates data across multiple AZ for high availability.

title: AWS Certificate Manager
description: Manages SSL/TLS certificates to secure websites or applications. Provisions, deploys, and renews certificates.

title: AWS Application Migration Service
description: Helps migrate applications from on-premises to AWS with minimal downtime. Replicates servers in AWS and automates migration without re-architecting apps.

title: AWS Systems Manager
description: A tool to manage and automate tasks across AWS resources. Centralized dashboard for patching, running scripts, viewing logs, and inventory management.

title: AWS Service Catalog
description: Lets organizations create and manage approved AWS resource templates. Helps enforce compliance and standardize deployments for teams.

title: AWS Artifact
description: A portal for compliance reports and agreements. Download documents like ISO certifications or SOC audit reports for auditing purposes.

title: AWS Shield
description: A DDoS protection service that automatically protects AWS resources. Shield Standard: Free and automatic protection. Shield Advanced: Extra protection with 24/7 AWS security team support.

title: Amazon Kinesis
description: Enables real-time processing and analysis of streaming data. Collect, process, and analyze real-time data. low latency and flexible consumption patterns.

title: AWS Well-Architected Tool
description: A tool to review workloads against AWS best practices. Based on the Well-Architected Framework’s 6 pillars. Identifies risks and offers improvement guidance.

title: Operational Excellence
description: Running workloads efficiently and improving processes over time. Automate operations, monitor systems, respond to events quickly.

title: Security
description: Protecting data, systems, and assets. Implement IAM, encryption, and logging. Least privilege access.

title: Reliability
description: Ensuring workloads perform correctly and recover quickly from failures. Design for high availability and automatic recovery.

title: Performance Efficiency
description: Using computing resources efficiently and scaling as needed. Choose the right instance types, use auto-scaling, and leverage managed services.

title: Cost Optimization
description: Reducing unnecessary costs and optimizing spending. Pay only for what you use, use Spot/Reserved instances, monitor spending.

title: Sustainability
description: Reducing environmental impact of cloud workloads. Optimize for energy efficiency, reduce unused resources.

title: AWS WAF (Web Application Firewall)
description: Protecting web applications from common exploits and attacks. (e.g., block SQL injection, XSS). Works with Amazon CloudFront, ALB, and API Gateway.

title: Amazon Machine Image
description: a template used to launch Amazon EC2 instances (virtual servers) in the AWS cloud. a blueprint, containing the operating system, applications, and configuration settings needed for a server to run.
